description:
odbc: handle variable width columns of 0 width

Fixes issue 4.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: lukemauldin@gmail.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/odbc

I was testing a similar change: http://play.golang.org/p/NiLk6Bapeb
I think the end result of our changes is the same but I think your change is cleaner.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/odbc/source/detail?r=3a97962d9419 ***

odbc: handle variable width columns of 0 width

Fixes issue 4.

R=golang-dev, lukemauldin
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/9009043

On 2013/04/29 12:14:08, lukemauldin wrote:
> I was testing a similar change: http://play.golang.org/p/NiLk6Bapeb
> I think the end result of our changes is the same but I think your change is
> cleaner.

Yes, I think they are very much similar. I have submitted mine.

Would you like to review https://codereview.appspot.com/9010043/ ?

Alex

subject: code review 9009043: odbc: handle variable width columns of 0 width
